name: CORKBRICK PLAY
description:
CORKBRICK empowers all to build walls or furniture, inside or outside the buildings with no tools, no screws, and no glue. 

CORKBRICK is a unique system of 7 cork elements that allows anybody to create and assemble furniture and structures in minutes. CORKBRICK is a flexible system: a bench can be turned into a table, then into a bar - the number of combinations is endless.

CORKBRICK PLAY - You can use Sketchup to create and design a personalised CORKBRICK solution such as shelves, beds, tables, chairs, and if your design gets selected for production, you will be rewarded every time a customer orders a CORKBRICK set, you designed. 

Design innovative CORKBRICK furniture and structure solutions and start earning perpetual royalties!

Be a pioneer creating with CORKBRICK!

More info at: challenge.corkbrick.com

Web version: https://web.corkbrick.com/play

Feel free to suggest any improvements for CORKBRICK PLAY, we are open to all the suggestions!
